scripts.html-mac: npx resumed render resume.json -o html/resume-macchiato.html -t jsonresume-theme-macchiato
scripts.pdf-mac: npx resumed export resume.json -o pdf/resume-macchiato.pdf -t jsonresume-theme-macchiato
scripts.html-eve: npx resumed export resume.json -o html/resume-even.html -t jsonresume-theme-even
scripts.pdf-eve: npx resumed export resume.json -o pdf/resume-even.pdf -t jsonresume-theme-even
scripts.html-spa: npx resumed export resume.json -o html/resume-spartan.html -t jsonresume-theme-spartan
scripts.pdf-spa: npx resumed export resume.json -o pdf/resume-spartan.pdf -t jsonresume-theme-spartan
scripts.html-sta: npx resumed export resume.json -o html/resume-stackoverflow.html -t jsonresume-theme-stackoverflow
scripts.pdf-sta: npx resumed export resume.json -o pdf/resume-stackoverflow.pdf -t jsonresume-theme-stackoverflow
